'''Everburning Heart''' is [[Chasca]]'s [[Night Realm's Gift Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* As a member of the [[Flower-Feather Clan]], Chasca can perform the following actions like the [[Qucusaurus]]:
** [[Gliding]] and flying in the air.
** Taking no damage from [[Gaseous Phlogiston]].
** Entering [[Gaseous Phlogiston|Phlogiston Wind Tunnel]].
** Consuming [[Gaseous Phlogiston|Scorchwind Conflux]].
